entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assertion failure `GC/Regressions/Github/Runtime_76219/Runtime_76219/Runtime_76219.sh` #80213
  • QuickJitForLoops causing regressions #80210
  • release/6.0 does not build cleanly with LLVM 13 / Xcode 13.3 #80208
  • [API Proposal]: APIs for source generating interop stubs for unmanaged virtual function tables #80204
    8.0.0
  • TryAddEnumerable for HttpClients #80202
  • JIT: build pred lists early, persist them throughout compilation #80193
    8.0.0
  • "DOTNET_EnableCrashReport" does not work for Windows platform #80191
  • Mono interpreter does not handle racy code with bounds checks #80184
  • dotnet cli does not handle arguments with quotes from PowerShell correctly #80177
  • macOS: Cannot add to X509Store #80176
  • [mono][interp] Offset allocation of call args is incorrect #80175
    8.0.0
  • Possible QuicConnection leak #80172
    8.0.0
  • Dump collection on runtime test timeouts does not work anymore #80170
  • [Test Failure] SendFileGetsCanceledByDispose fails on MacOS #80169
  • Misleading error "Cannot delete an already deleted object" #80167
  • Assertion failure: uint32_t GCEvent::Impl::Wait(uint32_t, bool): Assertion `(st != 110) || !m_state' failed #80166
  • Bringing down the size of Hello World under 2 MB #80165
  • Clarification required on WinHttpHandler connection lease #80163
  • SuperPMI: Investigate MISSING data for Linux/arm collection #80162
  • (An error occurred while deserializing the Fields property of class divitiae_api.Models.Item: Cannot dynamically create an instance of type 'System.Text.Json.Nodes.JsonObject'. Reason: No parameterless constructor defined.) #80161
  • `JsonEncodingStreamWrapper` cannot handle UTF16 BOMs #80160

Closed

  • emcc received SIGKILL #79874
  • Hang when HTTP/2 WebSocket connects to a HTTP/1.1 non-TLS kestrel endpoint #80056
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Regression in `System.Text.Json` tests with AOT #80179
    8.0.0
  • ConfigurationBinderBenchmarks.Get benchmark failing in "Performance Linux x64 release mono Interpreter micro_mono perftiger NoJS False net8.0" #80141
  • Install-Package: Dependency loop detected for package 'System.Text.Encoding.CodePages'. #79688
    Future
  • HMACSHA256 doesn't pad key when the secret is under 64 bytes #80180
    Future
  • RSAOpenSSL doesn't appear to support HSM-managed keys? #36938
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: #79923
  • Extend CA1310 to warn about Dictionary<string, T> and HashSet<string> #79932
  • [6.0][7.0] MacCatalyst Mono - XcodeBuildApp failed moving directory #79859
  • wrong cookie parse #74794
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Utf8FormatterTests #78041
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Library tests failing during linking for AOT - `SIGKILL` #79569
    8.0.0
  • running "Convert to GeneratedRegexAttribute" fixer wants to fix all kinds of other things #79892
    8.0.0
  • Getting Java.IO.FileNotFoundException on calling httpClient.PostAsync in MAUI app - Android #80139

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid unobserved ReadAheadTask exceptions in HttpConnection #80214
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary static field from BigInteger #80212
    area-System.Numerics
  • Use MemoryExtensions.Split in MimeBasePart.DetectEncoding #80211
    area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0] Fix SignedCms certificate collection modification with attribute certificates #80209
    area-System.Security
  • Fix regex test compilation failure on .NET Framework 4.8 #80207
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix assembly unloading for DispatchInfo #80203
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Switch a few ThrowIfLessThan(..., 1) calls to be ThrowIfNegativeOrZero(...) #80201
    area-System.Collections
  • Enable installer tests on osx-arm64 #80198
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Remove use of handles in interp_exec_method and instead use a reserved stack slot #80197
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/7.0] Use platform runtime check for ProtectedData #80196
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • JIT: Refactor post phase checks #80194
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Annotate platform specific hardware intrinsics with the ConstExpected attribute #80192
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fixing the race condition while modifying pending_ops #80190
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix alloc/dealloc mismatches and some buffer overruns found by ASAN #80189
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix SignedCms certificate collection modification with attribute certificates #80188
    area-System.Security
  • Remove dead code relating to switching AppDomains in CCWs #80187
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Ignore stale PGO data in impCastClassOrIsInstToTree #80183
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add SslClientAuthenticationOptions.ClientCertificateContext #80182
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] optimize out 'is this method MulticastDelegate.Invoke' checks in jiterpreter invokes #80181
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [draft][browser] enable closure compiler for dotnet.js #80178
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Remove page map from PAL virtual memory allocator #80173
    Servicing-consider, area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Disable hardware intrinsics tests under gcstress for macOS-arm64 and arm32 #80168
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] Lowercase TargetOS #80164

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Update 10.15 to 12.00 queues #80030
  • Fix HTTP/2 extended connect hang #80066
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix issue with clearing of unused defs #80186
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Support deleting "entire" stores in the VN-based dead store removal phase #79505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Update a few dependencies #79036
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.14
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 to 6.0 #78247
    Servicing-approved, area-Serialization, 6.0.14
  • [release/7.0] Ensure that OptionsCache only permits creating a single options instance per name #80150
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Options, 7.0.3
  • Add tests for Compute{Counter}Signature with attribute certificates #80195
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Remove duplicate android and wasm yaml templates to run the runtime tests after a "global-build" build step. #80157
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0] [mono][interp] Add unbox when calling valuetype method through delegate #79614
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Fix handling of backtracking stack with some loops #79361
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] fix marshaling Error to C# as JSType.Any #79352
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0][Android] Fix SslStream on legacy Android API levels #79280
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Add RollForward=Major for WasmAppHost . #79315
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.3
  • Base64.Decode: fixed latent bug for invalid input that is less than a block-size #79952
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Enable regex generator nullable reference types validation #80142
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Correctly escape library names when generating symbols for .c #79175
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.3
  • [mono][debugger] Debugger method invokes dont' handle ref fields in ref structs #76332
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] Workaround MacCatalyst .app output path change in cmake 3.25 #79097
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Workaround MacCatalyst .app output path change in cmake 3.25 #79098
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0] Move AT_EXECFN to fallback for /proc/self/exe #79057
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 7.0.3
  • [Release/7.0] Don't emit manifest for NativeRuntimeEventSource (#78213) #79009
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Use "node:crypto" to polyfill getRandomValues on older node #78766
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Fix ALC lookup from the DAC #78420
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Generate diagnosable failfast in GVM resolution #78936
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Fix DiagnosticSource to work with NativeAOT #78532
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.3
  • Use platform runtime check for ProtectedData #80158
    area-System.Security
  • Delete erroneous simplifer annotation for regex fixer #80126
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix SignedCms certificate collection modification with attribute certificates #79940
    area-System.Security
  • Add Visual Studio debugging note to libraries README #80185
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix CngKey.KeySize for keys in the Platform Crypto Provider #77809
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm] AOT BCL tests using -O1 to avoid OOM errors on CI. #80103
  • Enable CoreCLR init failure logging in single exe host #80104
    area-Host, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Upgrade .NET Framework queue #79666
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Update branding to 7.0.3 #80153
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Add ConditionalSelect SIMD intrinsics #80145
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Upgrade .NET Framework queue #79665
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.14 #80152
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Clean-up ILLink targets and avoid binplacing #80102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve emitter output for IG creation/saving and other improvements #80151
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] enable JITs for interp->aot and aot->interp transitions #78493
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • Improve logging of GC ref map mismatches #80219
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix HFA detection in Crossgen2 #80218
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix bug introduced by page bitmap removal #80216
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure that we don't root the compilation when using a custom exception marshalling type. #80147
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to symbolOptions from dap. #79284
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - Fold 'x & 255' and 'x & 65535' to a cast #79630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use function pointers instead of marshalled delegates in EventSource #79970
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add AVX2 support to IndexOfAnyValues #78863
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • initial support for '@' symbol in message template #79038
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Replace the last two SIMDIntrinsic in LIR with NamedIntrinsic and delete GT_SIMD #80027
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improving the SIMD codegen for SIMD12 load/store #80083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add more specialized frozen collection types. #79794
    area-System.Collections
  • JIT: Allow sharing call temps within statements #79574
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Put back setting of field in DirectorySearcher.FindAll #79191
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, 6.0.14
  • [Release/6.0] Don't emit manifest for NativeRuntimeEventSource (#78213) #79008
    Servicing-consider, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.14
  • JIT: experiment with early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add faster DAC EnumMemoryRegion option with less memory usage #79014
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • SimdAsHWIntrinsic improvements and cleanup #80134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable new analyzers CA1510/11/12/13 and CA1856/57/58 #80149
    area-Meta
  • [release/7.0] [Android] Fix path to `ping` on Android API 21-27 #80120
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • [release/7.0] [mono][aot] Fixed decompose_flag propagation issues #79855
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix dump creation on MacOS Ventura #79360
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • Include GC in the default rundown keyword for eventpipe #79671
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix bunch of incompatibilies of ComWrappers #80119
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [.NET 7] Fix spurious OOMs after upgrading to 7 #79158
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement Shuffle, GetString, and GetItems on Random{NumberGenerator} #78598
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Add warning code to all warnings produced in WasmAppBuilder #79234
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.3
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in the RegexCompiler and source gen #78927
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Do not override content root with default #79411
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Fix compression #79547
    area-System.Net, 7.0.x
  • Convert MemoryMarshal.GetArrayDataReference to a JIT intrinsic #79760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0][workloads] Automatically calculate the net6 patch version #79299
    7.0.x
  • [release/7.0][wasm][debugger] Improvements in debugging in async methods #79542
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix a few profiler related issues associated with frozen objects #79563
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Put back setting of field in DirectorySearcher.FindAll #79192
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, 7.0.3
  • Disable outerloop tests on mono/mobile and fix timeout in sendtohelixhelp.proj #79885
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cross-compile Wasm cross-compilers for ARM64 machines #74428
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • More timeout checks in RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #74531
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix crash in fixer on certain invalid patterns #80007
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Removing console.debug message helper to make debugger work. #72812
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Avoid generating unnecessary debug info #80143
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix compression #79549
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.x
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan (or field caching downlevel) #79461
    area-Meta
  • fix TLS resume with client certificates #79898
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Improve the performance of ConditionalWeakTable.TryGetValue #80059
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [build] Use MonoWasmBuildVariant to select runtime variant #80024
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix numbering of exposed `LCL_VAR`s #79772
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not set flags for JTRUE op1 #76731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix ConnectAsync with buffer on Windows #79866
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [mono][aot] Optimize constrained calls made from gsharedvt methods. #79339
  • Refactoring tests to support both external and loopback servers #74579
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Deconstruct for DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, and TimeOnly #79499
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • [mono][aot] Avoid emitting gshared methods multiple times when prefer… #80100
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm] optional legacy JS interop #79622
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0

    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, tenet-reliability, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Respect SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 #79997
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, tenet-reliability, 6.0.x
  • Fix parsing the output of `ping` on Samsung phones #80133
    area-System.Net
  • Transform local indirections off of `TYP_BLK` locals; support numbering exposed LCL_FLDs #79771
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add structural equality and order comparison for common collections #80025
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use lower size optimization for tests #80137
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • WIP: Poof of concept port of interleave feature #78374
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Use helpers for implicit casts in importer #78279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Add a bitset with IL jump targets #80136
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Use QueueUserAPC2 in GC suspension, if available. #80087
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update analyzers.md #79768
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fix pGeneratedNewStub determination #80128
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • improve SslStream exception after disposal #79329
    area-System.Net.Security

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-04
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Various fixes and code cleanup #2144

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: dispatch #2145
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Upgrade to LLVM v15 and opaque pointers #2139
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: merge the change to running tests #2143

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MSBuild does not resolve WindowsBase correctly #29743
  • Error while running dotnet test on Ubuntu-latest in GitHub actions #29742
  • MSBuild task calling WCF service fails with exception with dotNet 7.0 #29734
  • 无法安装 Unable to install #29728

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a reminder for the Area-AspNetCore PR authors to help with finding the schedule #29749
    Area-AspNetCore, DO NOT MERGE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2079699 #29747
    Area-Infrastructure
  • fix locale-sensitive comparison of UnmatchedArgument error strings #29746
    Area-CLI, cli-ux, 7.0.2xx

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29629
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.2xx] Revert hot reload script injection response buffering #29152
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration (7.0.2xx backport) #29549
    Servicing-consider, Area-Tools
  • fix the floating issue with tests run in VerifySettingFixture..ctor #29717
  • cover template samples with tests + fix floating issue with test run #29716
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29756
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Set the CHCP Language Page to the Corresponding Culture #29755
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29753
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Branding for 6.0.4xx #29752
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Branding for 6.0.300 #29751
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Branding for 6.0.1xx #29750
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding Microsoft.AspNetCore.EnsureJsonTrimmability host configuration #29719
    Area-Infrastructure
  • dotnet tool install skip unlisted version #28951
  • Include dotnet-watch redist output in layouts #29611
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.406 #29722
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.309 #29721
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.114 #29720
    Area-Infrastructure
  • fix locale-sensitive comparison of UnmatchedArgument error strings #29559
    Servicing-consider, Area-DotNet Test
  • Fix copy failures when building Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Razor.Tasks.csproj #29534
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Do not eagerly discover CWD during parser construction #28836
    Area-CLI, cli-ux, 7.0.2xx
  • Create an SDK PR guide #29562
    Area-Infrastructure
  • extend typo correction functionality with StartsWith and Contains #29350
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • File-local types #6011
    11.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Clarify some aspects of primary constructor parameters capturing #6855

Updated

  • Fix documentation-comment.md urls #6856

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support sync namespace for partial classes #66244
  • Include AdditionalLocations in diagnostic baselines #66240
  • Improve interpolated string handler compilation errors #66235
    Backlog
  • ChangeSignatureCodeRefactoringProvider throws a NullReferenceException #66224

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33304.99 #66237
  • ArgumentException from RemoteDiagnosticAnalyzerService #66138
  • Removed analyzers still show up in solution explorer (legacy .csproj) #66044
  • Deprecate all public constructors of various diagnostic analysis context types #63440
    17.5
  • When a diagnostic is disabled by default, updating the rule does not enable it #66085
  • Cannot rename a class that contains a GeneratedRegex method #66208
  • Convert foreach to LINQ can leave unnecessary parentheses #39727
    Backlog
  • Replace `DeclarationScope` with `ScopedKind` #64248
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Emit stackalloc block initializer for byte-sized enums #66251
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Ensure that side effects of conditional access on an instance of a nullable type are not preserved in generic code #66250
    Area-Compilers
  • Unify `ConstantValueOpt` and `ConstantValue` properties #66248
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • workaround tabular data control focus issue #66247
    Area-IDE
  • Allow missing document in method debug info (#66183) #66246
    Area-Interactive
  • Fix potential invalid TextSpan when reporting FAR results #66245
    Area-IDE
  • Mitigate crash in navigate-to. #66242
    Area-IDE
  • Fix a couple of cases where feature options were not being hooked up. #66241
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid contract failures in PreviewSolutionCrawlerRegistrationService … #66239
    Area-IDE
  • Apply XAML template on AbstractCheckBoxViewModel instead of one specific subclass #66238
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Implemented `Make property required` codefix #66233
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66243
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Allow rename on items also defined in SG #66209
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2079458 #66227
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66236
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Snap 17.5 P3 #66214
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release 17.6 back to main #66218
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Ensure solution is fully loaded before gathering semantic errors #66234
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add tests that verify options with language specific storage location… #66222
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Skip implicit build optimization for false value of `OptimizeImplicitlyTriggeredBuild` #66182
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Incremental Generators docs update #63500
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, Next
  • Fix race condition in PerformanceQueue.AnalyzerNumberAssigner #66230
    Area-Analyzers, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Deprecate public constructors of various diagnostic analysis context types #64083
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Account for SpecificDiagnosticOptions in analyzer driver checks for enabling a disabled by default rule #66087
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • If you see parentheses simplify them #66203
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66228
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66226
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Look at adding `windows.11.arm64.open` to HelixConstants #45885
  • Perf regression: plaintext #45877
  • Perf improvement: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #45876
  • IsTfaEnabled #45874
  • DefaultHealthCheckService throws exception #45873
  • When returning a TypedResult from a controller or minimal API endpoint the configured JsonOptions are not used #45872
  • Support description for response status code in the Open API #45871
  • UserManager and SignInManager cancellation tokens #45869
  • IEndpointRouteBuilder.Map throws an exception for a parameter of a nullable value type with a default value #45867
  • [AOT] Improve suppressions on RouteEndpointDataSource #45863
  • [AOT] ProblemDetails and Extension values #45862
  • [AOT] React to DependencyInjection requires dynamic code changes #45861
    8.0-preview1
  • [AOT] Unit testing features with Native AOT #45860
  • Reduce record usage in published aspnetcore projects #45859

Closed

  • Quarantine `Settings_MaxHeaderListSize_Server` #45811
    Test failures
  • Explicitly de-dupe ReferenceCopyLocalPaths in Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.csproj #45033
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Need Urgent fix for CookieHeaderParserShared throws exception when last cookie contains invalid character in .NET7 #45665
    7.0.3
  • Inconsistent casing of template parameters #40970
    Backlog
  • CascadingTypeParameter not working as expected #45415
  • Endpoint calling middlewares defined after IEndpointRouteBuilder.CreateApplicationBuilder() call #45868
  • Route parameter TryParse checks does not handle handler parameters with [FromRoute] attribute where name is provided. #45581
    .NET 8 Planning
  • 🎅 🎄 Happy Holidays, everyone! Responses for issues may be delayed till early January #17955
    Discussions
  • Delay in updating the UI in Server application. #45803
  • Add keys to OIDC state and retrieve at callback #45785

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't check in blazor.*.js files #45883
    area-blazor
  • Update to net8.0 SDK #45879
    area-infrastructure
  • Get EmptyHttpResult in RDF via reflection #45878
    area-runtime
  • Fixed bug in NavigationManager.GetUriWithQueryParameter(s) to include uri with hash string #45870
    area-blazor
  • Fix `RequestDelegateMetadataResult.CachedFactoryContext` is unused #45865
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Bump json5 from 2.2.1 to 2.2.3 in /src/Components/Web.JS #45864
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies

Merged

  • Unset MicrosoftNetCompilersToolsetVersion #45881
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • React to new HttpClient header size check #45811 #45880
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix gRPC template tests #45702
    area-mvc, area-grpc, 8.0-preview1
  • Updated the Third Party Notices for 8.0 project templates #45853
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview1
  • Compatibility Suppressions #45681
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix cookie null regression #45715
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Update Helix.Common.props #45771
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.3
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3026483` to `71140c3` #45824
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.14
  • [release/6.0] Use new Arm64 Helix queues #45538
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.14
  • [release/7.0] Do not generate Content for request parameters in OpenAPI #45439
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, 7.0.3
  • [release/6.0] VS 17 installation #45381
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.14
  • [release/7.0] Use non-localized 7.0.x links in installer #45410
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-installers, feature-localization, 7.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Use non-localized 6.0.x links in installer #45403
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-installers, feature-localization, 6.0.14
  • Fix inconsistent casing of template parameters #45816
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Explicitly de-dupe ReferenceCopyLocalPaths in Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.csproj #45334
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Explicitly de-dupe ReferenceCopyLocalPaths in Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.csproj #45333
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.14
  • [release/7.0] Fix response code description in Minimal APIs #45244
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Endpoint filter pipeline now returns EmptyHttpResult in case of 400 BadRequest #45109
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] [Blazor][debugging] Support Debug on Chromium #45341
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `eb74422` to `f6fabbb` #45389
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.3
  • [AOT] Fix runtime warnings #45604
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix: Detect parsability when FromRoute attribute is used #45597

  • Update branding to 7.0.3 #45857
    area-infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.14 #45856

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Backport deletion of playwright tests #45852
    6.0.x
  • Added copy parameters to enable parallel build #45779
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Support STJ Polymorphism #45405
    area-web-frameworks

    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *

  • Fix support for parameter names sourced from attributes (#45572) #45591

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SafeArea gets applied to any child controls even if you've disabled the safe area for the page #12417
  • Shell TitleView Not updating binding after navigation #12416
  • HorizontalStackLayout does not constrain correctly #12415
  • [Bug] iOS Border with RoundedRectangle StrokeShape doesn't clip content #12414
  • Could not find a valid Xcode app bundle at '/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools' #12410
  • [MacCatalyst] `Authorization.ExecuteWithPrivileges` returns -60031 #12409
  • App crashes in release with a specific Android code #12407
  • Maui Keyboard Bugs both with AdjustPan/AdjustResize #12406
  • [Win UI] Slider throws an exception when trying to move the thumb #12405
    Backlog
  • [.net7][iOS] IconImageSource exception(Unable to load image file) #12403
  • Picker without ItemsSource cannot display added items on WinUI #12402
    Backlog

Closed

  • Border content clipping issue on iOS #12398
  • MAUI program crash upon startup #12355
  • MAUI iOS is not working properly after it is delivered to Appstore, or TestFlight #12353
  • Windows deadlock when copying text in Entry #12369
  • Border with URL source does not render correctly #12400
    Backlog
  • Cursor jumps to start when writing on Entry (Android, TextTransform) #12411
  • R8 : warning : Missing class androidx.window.extensions.WindowExtensions #10901
    Backlog
  • Assembly load error in Android app referencing another project referencing a DLL assembly #10154
  • `dotnet publish` fails for Windows [MSB4184] #12389
    Backlog
  • Don't subscribe to ImmutableBrush #12345

PullRequests

Created

  • [Essentials] add Bluetooth permissions #12413
    community ✨
  • Remove old versions from bug template #12412
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Add Graphics DeviceTests #12404
  • Don't watch for changes on an ImmutableBrush #12346

Updated

  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • [iOS] Fix Entry Next Keyboard Button Finds Next TextField #11914
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Ensure image creation on any thread #12418
  • Address Android SearchBar keyboard issue relating to TextTransform #11981
    area/controls 🎮
  • Give fallback width/height for Shapes prior to layout #12356
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, area/TabbedPage
  • Keep handler flyoutview #12343
    area/FlyoutPage
  • Fix timing on iOS Toolbar #12363
    area/shell 🐢, area/toolbar
  • Bump xunit from 2.4.1 to 2.4.2 #9214
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Update Essentials PhoneDialer API Docs #12253
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add a null-guard in MenuItem to prevent NRE #12207
    t/bug, area/desktop 🖥️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to convert from IModel to RelationalModel and presserve annotations EFC #29980
  • Typo in XML documentation in EntityFrameworkQueryableExtensions #29978
  • EF Core 7 Scaffold-DbContext pluralizer incorrectly removes .ToTable() in many-to-many relationship #29977
  • ExecuteUpdate throws exception when entity has an autoinclude #29976
  • InsufficientInformationToIdentifyElementOfCollectionJoin error with join of join selection in queries with union #29975

Closed

  • Migration file is generated with same content #29879
    7.0.x
  • The host was aborted exception when adding new migration #29923
  • Migration trying to make foreign key to a synonym #29914
  • How to get rid of warning: The decimal property 'id' is part of a key on entity type 'SampleTable'? #29912
  • Howto update auto-implemented (by convention) many to many in Entity Framework Core 6 (.Net 6)? #29901
  • FirstOrDefault on DateTime column projection throws SqlException "The conversion of a varchar data type to a datetime data type resulted in an out-of-range valued" when sequence contains 0 items #29893
  • Why Collection navigations should never be null ? #29892
  • Using same type as nested owned property cause "Attempted to update or delete an entity that does not exist in the store" in disconnected state. #29877
  • Using `ModelBuilder.Entity` in `DbContext.OnModelCreating` for an owned entity type results in a `System.InvalidOperationException` #29869
  • Relations in ef c not mapped in sqlite provider #29844
  • Use case-insensitive key comparisons by convention when underlying database is case-insenstive #27526
    8.0.0
  • Allow value converters to change the DbType #24771
    8.0.0
  • Relational mapping hints are lost when applied to existing converter #29966
    8.0.0
  • HasMaxLength(-1) should force maximum length #29627
    8.0.0
  • empty resultset using JSON_VALUE + JSON_QUERY sql server #29885

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix grammar in XML doc for ToQueryString #29979

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Revert shared columns validation breaking change #29867
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Avoid circular dependency for unique indexes with null values #29921
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Update discriminator columns when PK-to-PK dependent type is changed #29920
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Avoid infinite loop during foreign key discovery #29850
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Allow underscores in identifiers again #29822
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Include table name for overrides in snapshot. #29820
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Avoid redundant looping in property metadata #29807
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Reset query tracking behavior correctly if set on DbContextOptions #29797
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Fix making column required on SQL Server with idempotent migrations #29784
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Allow shared columns with nullable value converters #29778
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Fix missing HasForeignKey when principal key is an alternate key #29731
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Use correct parameter in query based on type mapping #29724
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Support entities with owned types in ExecuteUpdate setter property lambda #29723
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Fix bug where a non-sproc command comes before a sproc command #29722
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Fix SQL Server bulk insert edge case (#29669) #29717
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • Use raw string literals in scaffolding tests #29965
    auto-merge
  • Use case-insensitive string comparisons by default on SQL Server #29955
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #29974
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Fix relational mapping hints and add DbType #29967
  • HasMaxLength(-1) sets unbounded max length #29959
  • Don't proxy navigations not configured for lazy loading #29957
  • Update branding to 6.0.14 #29972
  • Update branding to 7.0.3 #29973
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Updated

  • Working implementation of precompiled queries #29949
  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Fix code for EF6 many-to-many pattern #29793
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Handle FK on keyless entity type #29779
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
